author: kamrul
msg: Closes GH-0164 use a system property as logs dir
Now Oozie uses OOZIE_LOGS system property as the root for the logs.
If OOZIE_LOGS is not defined, it uses ${OOZIE_HOME}/logs.

author: kamrul
msg: Closes GH-0161 remove DG_UsingHadoopKerberos.twiki as it is obsolete

author: kamrul
msg: Closes GH-0160 KerberosHadoopAccessorService should be the default

author: kamrul
msg: Closes GH-0145 distro assembly permissions setting break re-build
setting only execute permissions to scripts, all other files go with
default permission (which are owner RW, group/other R)

author: kamrul
msg: Closes GH-0151 examples should use a share lib
Pig and streaming JARs should be in a share lib directory.
This would show the sharelib functionality and it will bundle
streaming/pig JARs only once (instead once per workflow app using them)
